testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: What our customers say about us

testimonial1.name: Max Mustermann
testimonial1.text: Since we started using KI-Helpbot, we've had 40% more appointment requests and our staff saves valuable time on routine inquiries.

testimonial2.name: Laura Schmidt
testimonial2.text: The chatbot answers questions about order status and returns 24/7 and has significantly improved our customer satisfaction.

testimonial3.name: Thomas Weber
testimonial3.text: Thanks to the AI assistant, we can plan appointments more efficiently and have fewer administrative tasks. A real work relief!
